Code: EXEC SQL SELECT T1.COD_IMP_INTERNO, T1.DATA_INIVIG_IMP, T1.VALOR_IMPOSTO, T2.SIGLA_IMP FROM SEGUROS.FI_PAGA_DOCF_IMP T1, SEGUROS.FI_PAGA_DOCF_IMP T2 WHERE T1.NUM_DOCF_INTERNO = :NUM_DOCF_INTERNO AND T1.COD_TP_LANCDOCF = :COD_TP_LANCDOCF AND T1.DT_INIVIG_LANCDOCF = :DT_INIVIG_LANCDOCF AND T1.COD_IMP_INTERNO = T2.COD_IMP_INTERNO AND T1.DATA_INIVIG_IMP = T2.DATA_INIVIG_IMP ORDER BY T1.COD_IMP_INTERNO END SQL
